author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] Create a copy of the conf in ClientLocalScanner since we are modifying it

Summary: In ClientLocalScanner.openStoresOnClient, we modify the conf to set the fs.default.name to be the value obtained from the hbase cluster the htable is create for. But, doing so will modify the conf passed in. In case the user intends to use the config later, it might have unknown effects.
Test Plan: Trivial change. Hot fix for search005

author: liyin
msg: [master] Add log for analyzing why sometimes table cannot be created
Summary: We can know how long as a whole does it take for checking table success or not.

author: liyin
msg: `TestHTableMultiplexer.testCachedOfHTable` assumes a table to be existing named `testCounters`, this is a bad and wrong assumption.
Change the name of the table to a unique one, create that table.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-11138][0.89-fb] Check for an empty split key before creating a table
Summary: HBaseAdmin#checkSplitKeys() doesn't check for empty split keys, which can cause multiple regions with the same start key (i.e., ""). This diff fixes that.
Test Plan: Added a unit test

author: liyin
msg: [master] Move TestLogRolling to JUnit4 so that surefire will respect unstable tags.
Test Plan: mvn clean test -Dtest=TestLogRolling doesn't run any test.
